title: Add Brilliant Coaching Centre logo to Hero section

requirements.text: Replace the current placeholder logo in the Hero component with the uploaded Brilliant Coaching Centre logo (Brilliant Coaching Centre copy.jpg) showing a lightbulb design with yellow student figure and the text 'brilliant COACHING CENTRE' in gold/yellow on dark background with maroon border
acceptanceCriteria: The Hero component displays the uploaded Brilliant Coaching Centre logo
Logo maintains proper aspect ratio and visual quality
Logo is prominently displayed in the hero section
Logo styling is consistent with the existing gold/yellow and maroon brand colors

requirements.text: Store the uploaded Brilliant Coaching Centre logo as a static asset in the frontend/public/assets/generated directory and update the Hero component to reference this asset path
acceptanceCriteria: Logo file is saved in frontend/public/assets/generated directory
Hero component src attribute points to the correct asset path
Logo loads correctly on page render

constraints: Do not modify the backend/main.mo file

Do not edit immutable frontend paths: frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, frontend/src/components/ui
nonGoals: Modifying the logo content or branding
Changing other sections beyond the Hero component
Adding animation effects to the logo
